<!-- 2. Go to Tools: Import in the WordPress admin panel. -->

	<item>
		<title>Slider Items Custom post Type</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/custom-post-type/slider-custom-posttype/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 30 Dec 2013 09:35:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/slider-custom-posttype.png</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In the Slider custom post type one can add as many slider items as desired. They can be grouped by category, edited, deleted and presented in any page by shortcode or by inserting a slider in the Featured Header.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Manage Slider Custom Post Type]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2673</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2013-12-30 09:35:48]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2013-12-30 09:35:48]]></wp:post_date_gmt>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Aliquam erat volutpat. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Vestibulum ultricies pretium molestie. Nulla ornare lacus sit amet dui ornare luctus. Fusce elementum orci nec velit tristique posuere. Pellentesque commodo posuere nulla sit amet pharetra. Quisque hendrerit eleifend elit a cursus. Aliquam lobortis venenatis ipsum fermentum rhoncus. Sed tristique lobortis ante quis ultricies. Aliquam at aliquam nisi. Nam tincidunt diam sit amet dui tempus et malesuada dolor consequat. Morbi et risus non diam pretium dictum at a dolor.]]></content:encoded>

		<title></title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/2013/11/04/1434/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 04 Nov 2013 07:02:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/2013/11/04/1434/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Google Maps Parameters [divider_line] [list style="list1"] width height address: Address on which the viewport will be centered. latitude: Point on which the viewport will be centered. If not given and no markers are defined the viewport defaults to world view. longitude: Same as above but for longitude… zoom: Zoom value from 1 to 19 where 19 is the greatest and 1 the smallest. html: Content that will be shown within the info window for this marker. popup: If true the info window for this marker will be shown when the map finished loading. If “html” is empty this option will be ignored. controls: A simple array of string values representing the function names (without “()”) to add controls. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values. If empty the default map controls will be applied. scrollwheel: Set to false to disable zooming with your mouses scrollwheel. If “controls” is not set this option will be ignored (because default map controls are applied). maptype: Predefined variable for setting the map type. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values. marker: Set to false to disable display a marker in the viewport. [/list] [divider_top] Simple map with marker…]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Blog Posts Parameters [divider_line] [list style="list1"] count (number of posts to show per page) category (specific category to show) (optional) posts (specific posts to show) (optional) image (whether to display featured image): true,false meta (whether to display meta information): true,false full (whether to display all content of the post): true,false nopaging (whether to disable pagination): true,false [/list] [divider_padding] Samples [divider_line] Blog with Image &amp; Meta &amp; Paging [code] [blog count="3" nopaging="false"] [/code] [blog count="3" nopaging="false"] [divider_top] Blog with Image [code] [blog count="1" meta="false"] [/code] [blog count="1" meta="false"] [divider_top] Blog with Meta [code] [blog count="1" image="false"] [/code] [blog count="1" image="false"] [divider_top] Blog without Image &amp; Meta [code] [blog count="1" image="false" meta="false"] [/code] [blog count="1" image="false" meta="false"] [divider_top] Blog with Specific Category [code] [blog count="1" cat="4,5" image="false"] [/code] [blog count="1" cat="4,5" image="false"] [divider_top] Blog with Specific Post [code] [blog count="1" posts="1" image="false"] [/code] [blog count="1" posts="1" image="false"]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Blog</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/blog/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 29 Sep 2010 05:45:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Blog Page</h2>
The striking theme has two ways to set a page to a blog listing page.

[tabs]
[tab title="By Wordpress Reading Settings" icon="book"  icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">By setting a static page as your blog listing page<br /> in the striking blog general settings.</h4>
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2265" alt="striking-global-blog-page" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-global-blog-page.png" width="964" height="585" />
[/tab]
[tab title="By Shortcode" icon="bolt"  icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">By inserting a Blog shortcode into any location in any page.</h4>
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3245" caption="Blog Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Blog Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Blog Shortcode Options Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]

<strong>Note : This means you can have unlimited blog listing pages.</strong>

<h2>Creating a blog listing page with the blogshortcode</h2>
Any page or even post can contain a bloglist showing one or more blogposts. This way a page can, for example show a small list of posts about a certain subject/topic, below the default story of that page. The bloglist can be inserted by a shortcode at any point into the body content of a page, post or even portfolio item. The shortcode is created and generated by the buildin striking shortcode generator and could look like this:
[code] [divider_line]<h2>Bloglist with full featured image above the title</h2>[divider_line]
[blog count="2" nopaging="true" imageType="full"] [divider_line]
<h2>Bloglist with full featured image below the title</h2>[divider_line]
[blog count="2" nopaging="true" imageType="below"] 
[/code] 
The shortcode generator can be found above the content editor and is shown in two different ways.


[tabs]
[tab title="Content Editor Visual Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In visual mode of the editor.</h4><img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode.png" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode" width="620" height="165" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2274" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Content Editor Text Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In text mode of the editor.</h4>
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2270" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-textmode" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-textmode.png" width="620" height="138" /></li>
[/tab]
[/tabs]


<h2>Bloglist presentation</h2>
The striking bloglist can have different layouts and presentations.


[tabs]
[tab title="Above" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A full featured image above the title.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-full-above.png" alt="bloglist-full-above" width="620" height="468" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2311" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Below" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A full featured image below the title.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-full-below-title.png" alt="bloglist-full-below-title" width="620" height="466" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2313" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Left" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A left side located feature image.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-leftfloat-image.png" alt="bloglist-leftfloat-image" width="620" height="245" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2294" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Right" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A right side located feature image.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-rightfloat-image.png" alt="bloglist-rightfloat-image" width="620" height="245" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2300" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Column" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A Bloglist in more then one and up to 6 columns.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-multi-columns.png" alt="bloglist-multi-columns" width="620" height="334" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2302" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Boxed" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A Bloglist with a border around each of the posts.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/bloglist-framed-full.png" alt="bloglist-framed-full" width="620" height="501" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2333" />
[divider_line]<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">A Bloglist with a border around each of the posts with inner background coloring of the blogposts.</h4>[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-bloglist-boxmode-bgcolor.png" alt="striking-bloglist-boxmode-bgcolor" width="620" height="280" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2288" />
[/tab]
[/tabs]

<h5>Note : Size of the image for each layout (left, right, full, below or above title) and its effect (border, coloring, lightbox popup etc) can be set in the shortcode and/or striking blog settings.</h5>


 ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Portfolios</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/portfolio-pages/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 07:02:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Portfolio Pages</h1>
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>column</strong> (number of columns 1-8 to display)</li>
<li><strong>height</strong> (height of featured image) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>effect</strong> : icon, zoom, blurr, grayscale, rotate, morph, tilt, none (optional)</li>
<li><strong>layout</strong> : fullwidth, sidebar (optional)/li>
<li><strong>nopaging</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable_all</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ajax</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>cat</strong> : category to list</li>
<li><strong>current</strong> current category (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ids</strong> select items on id basis comma seperated (optional)</li>
<li><strong>orderby</strong> : no, page, author, post-id, title, date, random, parent-id, nr of comments, modified date (optional)</li>
<li><strong>order</strong> : DESC, ASC (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkTarget</strong> : _blank, parent, new window, full body (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc_length</strong> : length of description (optional)</li>
<li><strong>advanceDesc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>more</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreText</strong> : Read More Text (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreButton</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
</ul>[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3235" caption="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]
<h2>Sample</h2>
[portfolio column="3" layout="sidebar" sortable="true" ajax="true" cat="animals,nature,people,video" current="nature" more="false" moreButton="false"] 

]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Pages</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/pages/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 06:40:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Wordpress Pages</h2>

Because of all the striking abilities creating a page with content is very easy. The wordpress content editor is you notepad. Anything you write in there accompanied by images, shortcodes (presenting video, audio, typography, sliders, buttons... anything of your choice) will generate a stunning page at the front of your website. Almost anything you want you can create with the abilities of the striking theme with a ease beyond believe.

<h4>For Pages Striking offers 6 templates</h4>

We created 6 templates for pages one can choose from. But if you know your way around in wordpress and follow the theme logic you can easily create and add your own templates. Striking will find them and pick them up ready to us anywhere in your pages. The default page templates are :

[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Fullwidth Layout Template</li>
<li>Left Sidebar Layout Template</li>
<li>Right Sidebar Layout Template</li>
<li>Page with Comment Template</li>
<li>Landingpage Template</li>
<li>Sitemap Template</li>
</ul>[/list] 

<h4>Pages can be set to 3 different Layouts</h4>

The layouts to choose from are : 

[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Fullwidth Layout</li>
<li>Left Sidebar Layout</li>
<li>Right Sidebar Layout</li>
</ul>[/list] 

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/page-layout.png" alt="page-layout" width="595" height="341" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2432" />

<h3>Global default layouts</h3>

In each page, post or portfolio item a layout can be set to type "Default" in which case, for that page, post or portfolio item,  the default global layout will be picked up as set in the Striking Theme settings. Striking supports global layout settings for:

[tabs]
[tab title="Pages" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2436" caption="Global Page Layout Settings" alt="Global Page Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"] 
[/tab]
[tab title="Single Posts" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2437" caption="Global Single Post Layout Settings" alt="Global SinglePost Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"]
[/tab]
[tab title="Single Portfolio" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2438" caption="Global Single Portfolio Item Layout Settings" alt="Global Single Portfolio Item Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"]
[/tab]
[/tabs]]]></content:encoded>

You CAN’T go wrong getting and using this theme.
[/testimonial]

Thanks to everyone who works on this gorgeous, grand, grandiose theme!

I have been using WordPress and it’s templates since it’s inception and this is by far the best most effective template I have used to date. <h2>Basic Testimonials Layout</h2>

[blockquote cite="paulgandrews"]
This theme and KaptinLin’s support are second to none and definitely come highly recommended!

If you’re looking for an fantastic theme at a great price with plenty of scope for configuration, an excellent back-end and very prompt assistance then look no further than Striking.[/blockquote]

[blockquote cite="M. Ferguson"]The Striking theme is frequently updated and with each release becomes easier to use and easier to configure and customize. I'm regularly looking at other WordPress themes and I have yet to work with a solution that offers me more tools to create the look and feel I want. Timely and responsive support and a strong community of users make Striking the closest thing to being bulletproof solution.[/blockquote]

[blockquote cite="Andy"]I had been looking for a certain look for my Wordpress based site for some time and when a friend pointed be towards this theme, I knew it was just what I needed. However, I had no idea just how much customization could be done. Everything is there that you could wish for including all of your CSS tweaks made available through simple slider options. This is without a doubt, the most comprehensive and easy to use theme I have ever come across. Thank you for a wonderful product :)[/blockquote]

		<li>Curabitur sed sollicitudin mi.</li>
		<li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. </li>
		<li>Mauris metus tortor, commodo sit amet tempor id</li>
	</ul>
	[/list]
	<p>[button id="standard_button" size="large" color="blue" full="true"]Get Started[/button]</p>
[/framed_box]
[/one_third]

[one_third_last]

	<item>
		<title>Shortcodes</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 14:43:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Shortcodes</h2>
Any page, portfolio item, excerpt, custom featured header text area, post etc. can contain any of the striking shortcodes. In striking almost every featured is shortcoded. This makes striking one of the most powerfull themes if not the most powerfull theme you can buy at Themeforest. You get real value for money because of alone this feature and we are not even talking about all the other features striking has.


[notice]<h4 style="margin-top:20px;">Shortcodes are One of the Powerfull Abilities of the Striking Theme</h4>
<p>Shortcodes allow you to create fancy looking stuff in any page without any knowledge of css or html. We created all those for you so you can take the credits building beautifull websites.</p>[/notice]

<h3>Striking shortcodes are inserted by the Striking shortcode generator</h3>
You can access the striking shortcode generator by the Striking shortcode Generator button above the default content editor. Any valid shortcode can be pasted into any text box, textwidget anywhere in wordpress. The shortcode button can be found here:

[tabs]
[tab title="Content Editor Visual Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In visual mode of the editor.</h4><img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode.png" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode" width="620" height="165" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2274" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Content Editor Text Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In text mode of the editor.</h4>
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2270" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-textmode" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-textmode.png" width="620" height="138" /></li>
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]
<h2>Available shortcodes in Striking</h2>

No theme at ThemeForest has this many shortcodes !! <strong>The Striking Theme is the number one Theme in shortcoding almost all of its own abilities !!</strong>

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/all-shortcodes.jpg" alt="all-shortcodes" width="710" height="1655" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2647" />
[divider_padding]


<h2>The Shortcodes Generator</h2>

Clicking on a shortcode from the shortcode menu opens the shortcode generator for the selected shortcode. A dialog with options is presented which can be set/changed and content can be added in the available text fields. After all options have been entered/changed and set the only thing left todo is to press the insert button. Now the complete shortcode is entered into the page body content area. Once the page is viewed in the front of the website the shortcode is processed and presents the outcome following the options  as set in the shortcode generator.

[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3230" caption="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel"]

<h3>How does a inserted shortcode look like?</h3>

Once you press the insert button in the shortcode generator the shortcode is inserted into the page content editor. The code might look like this (if you are inserting a framed box).

[code]
[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Cras rutrum nisi nec diam imperdiet mattis. Donec faucibus ipsum nec nisl vulputate blandit? Nulla sapien eros, interdum quis commodo id, viverra quis arcu. Cras fringilla justo eget posuere auctor? Nunc ac tincidunt risus. Aliquam ut eros metus! Quisque cursus eleifend feugiat? Nulla eget lacus fermentum, faucibus magna ac, ultricies ante! Suspendisse potenti. Nunc laoreet consequat fermentum. Nulla a nisl molestie, pretium enim vitae, dignissim metus. Cras et accumsan lacus, eget sodales metus!  [divider_padding] [carousel width="160" height="130" source="{p}" nav="true" title="Carousel Portfolio with 3 Columns"] [/carousel][/framed_box] 
[/code]

<h3>The result of processing that shortcode is this:</h3>

[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Cras rutrum nisi nec diam imperdiet mattis. Donec faucibus ipsum nec nisl vulputate blandit? Nulla sapien eros, interdum quis commodo id, viverra quis arcu. Cras fringilla justo eget posuere auctor? Nunc ac tincidunt risus. Aliquam ut eros metus! Quisque cursus eleifend feugiat? Nulla eget lacus fermentum, faucibus magna ac, ultricies ante! Suspendisse potenti. Nunc laoreet consequat fermentum. Nulla a nisl molestie, pretium enim vitae, dignissim metus. Cras et accumsan lacus, eget sodales metus! [divider_padding] [carousel width="160" height="130" source="{p}" nav="true" title="Carousel Portfolio with 3 Columns"] [/carousel][/framed_box] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Features</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 14:43:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Theme Features</h2>

The striking Theme which is sold at ThemeForest is unique in its kind. It has the most options, settings, shortcodes, sliders, abilities you will not found in any of the other Themes sold at Themeforest. Buying the Striking Theme gives you real value for your money and will not disappoint you in any way.

What we are good at:

[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>Unlimited Abilities</strong></li>
<li><strong>Custom Featured Header per page / post / portfolio items</strong></li>
<li><strong>Unlimited SlideShows.</strong></li>
<li><strong>Unlimited SlideShow Presets</strong></li>
<li><strong>Unlimited Portfolio Items</strong></li>
<li><strong>Adjust settings on a Page / Post basis</strong></li>
<li><strong>Custom CSS / JavaScript per Page / Post</strong></li>
<li><strong>Fully Optimized Code</strong></li>
<li><strong>Minified CSS and JavaScript reducing loadtime. We are smaller then the default WP theme</strong></li>
<li><strong>Almost everything is shortcoded</strong></li>
<li><strong>16 Predefined Striking Widgets</strong></li>
<li><strong>Access to the Striking 24Hrs Support forum and knowledge base</strong></li>
<li><strong>Typograhy a designer can only dream of</strong></li>
<li><strong>7 Sliders Available</strong></li>
<li><strong>Supports Woo Commerce</strong></li>
<li><strong>Supports Easy Digital Downloads</strong></li>
<li><strong>Supports BuddyPress</strong></li>
<li><strong>Supports Plugins with a huge userbase like Quform, Revolution Slider,</strong></li>
<li><strong>Support Any SEO plugin, The Yoast Seo is 100% supported</strong></li>
<li><strong>Custom background per Page (inner)</strong></li>
<li><strong>3 Layouts, left, right sidebar, fullwidth</strong></li>
<li><strong>6 Page Templates. Own ones can be added</strong></li>
<li><strong>Boxed Layout / Full Width</strong></li>
<li><strong>Unlimited Sidebars</strong></li>
<li><strong>Custom Sidebar per Page / Post / Archives / Category / Portfolio / 3rd Party Custom post Types</strong></li>
<li><strong>Wordpress Multisite Compatible</strong></li>
<li><strong>Portfolio and Slider Custom post Types</strong></li>
<li><strong>Sortable Portfolio Items</strong></li>
<li><strong>Unlimited Blog Listing pages by a Shortcoded Bloglist</strong></li>
<li><strong>Extensive Admin Backend Help Panels</strong></li>
<li><strong>Support WPML</strong></li>
<li><strong>Theme Localization is supported by language files. You can create your own.</strong></li>
<li><strong>And many more ... you can only think of. You name it we support or have it.</strong></li>
</ul>
[/list]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Typography</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/typography/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 14:45:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Typography</h2>

The striking theme comes with a huge amount of typography settings. For the theme used elements font-families, fontsizes, colors can be set in the theme settings. The theme has more then 700 Fonts and supports most of the commonly used html code. Striking  has presets (shortcodes) for typography : styled list, tables, dropcaps, blockquotes and so on. The list of the typographical abilities is almost endless. 

Moreover (skilled) users with css knowledge can adjust any element in each page, post or portfolio item by custom css and which can be added to the custom css field available on a page basis.

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/typography-3dperspective.jpg" alt="typography-3dperspective" width="867" height="820" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2421" />
[divider_padding]

<h2>Pre and Code</h2>
<h3>Code</h3>
[code]
function theme_code_before_filter_callback(&amp;$match){
	echo '<pre>';
	print_r($match);
	echo '</pre>';
	exit;
}
[/code]
<h3>Pre</h3>
[pre]
function theme_code_before_filter_callback(&amp;$match){
	echo '<code>';
	print_r($match);
	echo '</code>';
	exit;
}
[/pre]

<h4>Inside</h4>
[list style="list2" color="blue"]
<ul>
	<li>Nunc nulla. Etiam sollicitudin, ipsum eu pulvinar rutrum, tellus ipsum laoreet sapien, quis venenatis ante odio sit amet eros. Etiam rhoncus. Aenean imperdiet. Duis arcu tortor, suscipit eget, imperdiet nec, imperdiet iaculis, ipsum.</li>
	<li>Nam quam nunc, blandit vel, luctus pulvinar, hendrerit id, lorem. Nunc nulla. Pellentesque posuere. Suspendisse pulvinar, augue ac venenatis condimentum, sem libero volutpat nibh, nec pellentesque velit pede quis nunc. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu.</li>
	<li>Praesent egestas tristique nibh. Praesent ac sem eget est egestas volutpat. Sed magna purus, fermentum eu, tincidunt eu, varius ut, felis. Curabitur at lacus ac velit ornare lobortis. Sed augue ipsum, egestas nec, vestibulum et, malesuada adipiscing, dui.</li>
</ul>
[/list]

<h2>Highlight</h2>
<h3>Light</h3>
Morbi blandit, eros non blandit dictum, orci enim tincidunt odio, vitae tempus ipsum nibh quis est. Donec vehicula nisi sed dolor volutpat commodo. Nullam scelerisque varius tellus, in dapibus velit aliquet sit amet. Nullam tempus, [highlight]metus aliquam pretium tempus[/highlight], elit elit vehicula nisl, ut mattis nibh urna in sem. Curabitur eget libero vitae nibh lobortis adipiscing.
[code][highlight]your text with yellow highlight[/highlight][/code]
<h3>Dark</h3>
Morbi blandit, eros non blandit dictum, orci enim tincidunt odio, vitae tempus ipsum nibh quis est. Donec vehicula nisi sed dolor volutpat commodo. Nullam scelerisque varius tellus, in dapibus velit aliquet sit amet. Nullam tempus, [highlight type="dark"]metus aliquam pretium tempus[/highlight], elit elit vehicula nisl, ut mattis nibh urna in sem. Curabitur eget libero vitae nibh lobortis adipiscing.
[code][highlight type="dark"]your text with dark highlight[/highlight][/code]

<h2>Table Styles</h2>
[styled_table]
<table>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th scope="col"><strong>Company<strong></th>
			<th scope="col">Header 1</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 2</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 3</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 4</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tfoot>
		<tr>
			<td colspan="5"><em>The foot text for this table</em></td>
		</tr>
	</tfoot>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 1</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 2</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>

	<item>
		<title>Columns</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/columns/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 14:46:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Columns Layouts / Shortcode</h2>

[tabs]
[tab title="General Info" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Columns Shortcode Generator Menu</h3>
[divider_line]
Columns shortcode do and do not have a settings/options screen with content one can enter while inserting the shortcode. It depends on which columns shortcode is chozen. They are either inserted directly into the page content once a shortcode is selected in the shortcode menu or a shortcode options panel is presented with column options/content fields in which content for the columns can be entered before inserting the shortcode. Columns shortcodes can be inserted one by one (section by section) or by the use of a by complete layout-preset. [divider_padding]<strong>Note: Columns shortcode can be nested when they are not of the same type.</strong>
[/tab]
[tab title="Columns Shortcode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>The Shortcodes</h3>
[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/columnsshortcode.jpg" alt="columnsshortcode" width="782" height="584" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2754" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2014/01/shortcode-columns-3.png" alt="columns-3-shortcode" width="594" height="854"  />
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_top]

<h2>Available Layouts by Column Shortcode</h2>

	<item>
		<title>Buttons</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/buttons/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 15:19:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Button</h2>
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>id</strong> (id attribute) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>size</strong>: small,medium,large (optional)</li>
<li><strong>class</strong>  (class attribute) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>color</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>bgColor</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>textColor</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>align</strong>:center (optional)</li>
<li><strong>full</strong> (set full width):true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>link</strong> (link to follow when clicked) (optional)</li>
</ul>
[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3347" caption="Button Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Button Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" quality="100" autoHeight="true" lightbox="true" title="Button Shortcode Options Panel"]
[/tab]
[/tabs]

<h3>Samples</h3>
<h4>Buttons With Different Size</h4>
[divider_line]
[button size="small"]Small[/button] [button size="medium"]Medium[/button] [button size="large"]Large[/button]

[toggle title="Get the code"]
[code]
[button size="small"]Small[/button] [button size="medium"]Medium[/button] [button size="large"]Large[/button]
[/code]
[/toggle]

[divider_padding]

<h4>Buttons With Color Scheme</h4>
[divider_line]
[button size="medium" color="black"]Black[/button] [button size="medium" color="gray"]Gray[/button] [button size="medium" color="white"]White[/button] [button size="medium" color="blue"]Blue[/button] [button size="medium" color="green"]Green[/button] [button size="medium" color="red"]Red[/button] 

[button size="medium" color="yellow"]Yellow[/button] [button size="medium" color="orange"]Orange[/button] [button size="medium" color="pink"]Pink[/button] [button size="medium" color="rosy"]Rosy[/button] [button size="medium" color="magenta"]Magenta[/button]

[toggle title="Get the code"]
[code]
[button size="medium" color="black"]Black[/button]
[/code]
[/toggle]

[divider_padding]

<h4>Buttons With Special Color</h4>
[divider_line]

[button size="medium" bgColor="#769600"]#769600[/button] [button size="medium" color="white" textColor="#769600"]#769600[/button]

[toggle title="Get the code"]
[code]
[button bgColor="#769600"]#769600[/button]
[button color="white" textColor="#769600"]#769600[/button]
[/code]
[/toggle]

[divider_padding]

[code]
[button size="large" bgColor="#004f78" hoverBgColor="#930097"]Roll Over Button[/button]
[/code]

	<item>
		<title>Images</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/images/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 15:23:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Image</h1>
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>size</strong>: small,medium,large (optional)</li>
<li><strong>link</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>icon</strong>: zoom,play,doc (optional)</li>
<li><strong>lightbox</strong>: true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>align</strong>: left,right,center (optional)</li>
<li><strong>group</strong> (group for lightbox) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>width</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>height</strong> (optional)</li>
</ul>
[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2807" caption="Image Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Image Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Image Shortcode Options Panel"]
[/tab]
[/tabs]


[divider_top]

<h3>Image With Lightbox Support</h3>

[code]
[image icon="zoom" lightbox="true" title="Your Image Title"]your image src[/image]
[/code]

	<item>
		<title>Tabs &#038; Accordion &#038; Toggles</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/tabs-accordion-toggles/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 15:24:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]

[one_half]<h3>Types</h3>
[divider_line]
Tabs are available in type : 
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>Framed Horizontale Tabs</strong></li>
<li><strong>Mini Tabs Horizontale Tabs</strong></li>
<li><strong>Vertical Tabs</strong></li>
</ul>
[/list][/one_half]
[one_half_last]<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>tabs</strong> the shortcode wrapper</li>
<li><strong>tab</strong> the tab panel</li>
<li><strong>icon</strong> : icon name for tab (optional)</li>
<li><strong>icon_color</strong> : color of icon (optional)</li>
</ul>
[/list][/one_half_last]

[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3238" caption="Tabs Shortcode Option Panel" alt="Tabs Shortcode Option Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Tabs Shortcode Option Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]

<h2>Tabs</h2>
[tabs]
	[tab title="Tab 1"  icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
		<div>Mauris ultricies.</div> Nam feugiat egestas nulla. Donec augue dui, molestie sed, tristique sit amet, blandit eu, turpis. Mauris hendrerit, nisi et sodales tempor, orci tellus laoreet elit, sed molestie dui quam vitae dui. 
	[/tab]
	[tab title="Tab 2" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis viverra, leo sit amet auctor fermentum, risus lorem posuere tortor, in accumsan purus magna imperdiet sem. 
	[/tab]
	[tab title="Tab 3"  icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
		In sed dolor. Etiam eget quam ac nibh pharetra adipiscing. Nullam vitae ligula. Sed sit amet leo sit amet arcu mollis ultrices. Vivamus rhoncus sapien nec lorem. In mattis nisi. Vivamus at enim. Integer semper imperdiet massa. Vestibulum nulla massa, pretium quis, porta id, vestibulum vitae, velit. 
	[/tab]
[/tabs]
[code]
[tabs]
	[tab title="title 1" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
		contents
	[/tab]
	[tab title="title 2" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
		contents
	[/tab]
[/tabs]
[/code]

[divider_top]

<h2>Mini tabs</h2>
[mini_tabs]
	[tab title="Tab 1"]
		Mauris ultricies. Nam feugiat egestas nulla. Donec augue dui, molestie sed, tristique sit amet, blandit eu, turpis. Mauris hendrerit, nisi et sodales tempor, orci tellus laoreet elit, sed molestie dui quam vitae dui. 
	[/tab]
	[tab title="Tab 2"]
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis viverra, leo sit amet auctor fermentum, risus lorem posuere tortor, in accumsan purus magna imperdiet sem. 
	[/tab]
	[tab title="Tab 3"]
		In sed dolor. Etiam eget quam ac nibh pharetra adipiscing. Nullam vitae ligula. Sed sit amet leo sit amet arcu mollis ultrices. Vivamus rhoncus sapien nec lorem. In mattis nisi. Vivamus at enim. Integer semper imperdiet massa. Vestibulum nulla massa, pretium quis, porta id, vestibulum vitae, velit. 
	[/tab]
[/mini_tabs]

[code]
[mini_tabs]
	[tab title="title 1"]
		contents
	[/tab]
	[tab title="title 2"]
		contents
	[/tab]
[/mini_tabs]
[/code]

[divider_top]

<h2>Vertical tabs</h2>

[vertical_tabs]
[tab title=" Tab 1" icon="comment" icon_color="darkgray"]

Excepteur sint obcaecat cupiditat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
[/tab]
[tab title=" Tab 2" icon="cloud" icon_color="darkgray"]

At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum. Consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. Stet clita kasd gubergren, no sea takimata sanctus est Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet. At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum.
[/tab]
[tab title=" Tab 3" icon="flag" icon_color="darkgray"]
Consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat. Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat, vel illum dolore eu feugiat nulla facilisis. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.
[/tab]
[/vertical_tabs]

[code][vertical_tabs]
[tab title=" Tab 1" icon="comment" icon_color="darkgray"]
Content
[/tab]
[tab title=" Tab 2" icon="cloud" icon_color="darkgray"]
Content
[/tab]
[tab title=" Tab 3" icon="flag" icon_color="darkgray"]
Content
[/tab]
[/vertical_tabs][/code]

[divider_top]

[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>accordions</strong> the shortcode wrapper</li>
<li><strong>accordion</strong> the accordion panel</li>
<li><strong>icon</strong> : icon name for tab (optional)</li>
<li><strong>icon_color</strong> : color of icon (optional)</li>
</ul>
[/list]

[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3248" caption="Accordion Shortcode Option Panel" alt="Accordion Shortcode Option Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Accordion Shortcode Option Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]
<h2>Accordion</h2>
[one_third]
[accordions]
	[accordion title="Accordion 1"]
		Mauris ultricies. Nam feugiat egestas nulla. Donec augue dui, molestie sed, tristique sit amet, blandit eu, turpis. Mauris hendrerit, nisi et sodales tempor, orci tellus laoreet elit, sed molestie dui quam vitae dui. 
	[/accordion]
	[accordion title="Accordion 2"]
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis viverra, leo sit amet auctor fermentum, risus lorem posuere tortor, in accumsan purus magna imperdiet sem. 
	[/accordion]
	[accordion title="Accordion 3"]
		In sed dolor. Etiam eget quam ac nibh pharetra adipiscing. Nullam vitae ligula. Sed sit amet leo sit amet arcu mollis ultrices. Vivamus rhoncus sapien nec lorem. In mattis nisi. Vivamus at enim. 
	[/accordion]
[/accordions]
[/one_third]
[two_third_last]
Donec nec nisi mi. Sed malesuada ante eget ligula tristique congue. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Fusce ullamcorper, nunc et luctus vulputate, sapien metus gravida enim, eu tempor urna mauris a enim. Cras eu massa enim. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Cras bibendum porttitor turpis, eu sodales velit ultricies id. Etiam egestas malesuada lectus non ornare. Nullam sed tellus ac tellus fermentum vehicula vel non orci. Maecenas sem magna, bibendum id elementum vel, luctus ac velit. In posuere diam in sapien blandit iaculis. Aliquam erat volutpat. Nunc id sem id orci viverra consectetur. Aenean elementum varius turpis, in rhoncus magna ultricies quis. Nullam dignissim gravida elit ac semper. Maecenas vel erat in urna fringilla mattis. Maecenas ultrices posuere tempus. Sed nunc ipsum, suscipit eget tincidunt vel, aliquet a enim. Integer viverra convallis enim id facilisis.
[/two_third_last]
Nullam auctor fermentum sodales. Cras tortor urna, dictum at sollicitudin eget, adipiscing sed odio. Vestibulum a fermentum nisl. Sed dui erat, tempus vitae condimentum sed, dapibus eu risus. Integer et magna sed felis viverra placerat eu quis eros. Donec non placerat quam. Sed lorem lorem, porta ut volutpat ut, ultricies eu velit. Donec non turpis elit, ut ultrices mauris. Duis vitae congue augue. Maecenas sed ante ligula. 
[code]
[accordions]
	[accordion title="title 1"]
		contents
	[/accordion]
	[accordion title="title 2"]
		contents
	[/accordion]
[/accordions]
[/code]

[divider_top]
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>title</strong> the toggle titler</li>
<li><strong>open</strong> : true, false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>iconColor</strong> (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleSize</strong> sise in pixels (optional)</li>
<li><strong>align</strong> left, right(optional)</li>
</ul>
[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3249" caption="Toggle Shortcode Option Panel" alt="Toggle Shortcode Option Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Toggle Shortcode Option Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]
<h2>Toggle Content</h2>
[toggle title="<span style='color:red'>Click me to show/hide content</span>" iconColor="rgba(59,124,204,1)" titleSize="16" iconSize="20"]
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla blandit tempor diam, ut fringilla lorem convallis ac. Suspendisse dignissim dolor a est lobortis cursus. Nulla in odio id eros elementum dapibus. Fusce gravida dolor id turpis faucibus non varius turpis adipiscing.
[/toggle]
[toggle title="Click me to show/hide content" iconColor="rgba(59,124,204,1)" titleSize="16" iconSize="20"]
Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Donec ac tellus in nunc molestie viverra. Donec lectus massa, lobortis a fermentum eu, imperdiet sed orci. Morbi consequat est non nibh convallis quis viverra erat luctus.
[/toggle]
[code]
[toggle title="<span style='color:red'>Click me to show/hide content</span>" iconColor="rgba(59,124,204,1)" titleSize="16" iconSize="20"]
	the toggle content.
[/toggle]


[toggle title="Click me to show/hide content" iconColor="rgba(59,124,204,1)" titleSize="16" iconSize="20"]
       the toggle content.
[/toggle]
[/code]

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[center]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_feature_background_position_y]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[top]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_feature_background_repeat]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[no-repeat]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_feature_background_attachment]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_feature_background_size]]></wp:meta_key>

	</item>

	<item>
		<title>404 error page</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/pages/404-error-page/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 09:50:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking 404 page.</h2>

<strong>The text displayed on the 404 page can be modified, set and changed in the theme advanced settings</strong>

[error]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/error]

[toggle title="Grab the Code"][code][error]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/error][/code][/toggle] 

[divider_padding]

[framed_box bgColor="rgba(243,11,11,0.3)" borderColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" borderThickness="4" textColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/framed_box] 

[toggle title="Grab the Code"][code][framed_box bgColor="rgba(243,11,11,0.3)" borderColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" borderThickness="4" textColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/framed_box][/code][/toggle] 

[divider_padding]

[note title="404 error" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/note] 

[toggle title="Grab the Code"][code][note title="404 error" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/note] [/code][/toggle] 

[divider_padding]

[framed_box bgColor="rgba(60,171,206,.06)" borderColor="rgba(60,171,206,.4)" borderThickness="4" textColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/framed_box] 
[toggle title="Grab the Code"][code][framed_box bgColor="rgba(60,171,206,.06)" borderColor="rgba(60,171,206,.4)" borderThickness="4" textColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/framed_box][/code][/toggle] 

[divider_padding]

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-404-settings.png" alt="striking-404-settings" width="620" height="505" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2384" />


<h3>Featured Header 404 Code</h3>

In the featured header of this demo page we show a custom 404 message with a image. In responsive view (below 768) the image will disappear and the box will grow to 100%. This is done by CSS. 
You can grab the code below and do the same trick on your own website for your real 404 page. For this put the Featured Header ShortCode into the striking advanced settings -> Archive Title Settings -> 404 Page Text field and the supplied custom css into the striking global custom css box at the theme general settings.

[toggle title="Grab the Code For The Featured Header"]<h3>The Featured Header ShortCode</h3>[code] <h1 style="text-align:center">404 Not Found!</h1> 
[divider_padding][three_fifth][framed_box bgColor="rgba(243,11,11,0.3)" borderColor="rgba(243,11,11,1)" borderThickness="4" textColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center" width="70%" class="enlarge"]It looks like the page you're looking for isn't here anymore. Try using the search box or sitemap below.[/framed_box][/three_fifth]
[two_fifth_last]<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2013/11/rev_landing_girl.png" alt="rev_landing_girl" width="540" height="425" class="hideme alignnone size-full wp-image-1795" />[/two_fifth_last]
<p style="text-align:center">Hi you found the 404 page ! How can i help you?</p>  [/code]

<h3>The CSS</h3>
[code]@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
.hideme{display:none;}
.enlarge {width:100% !important;}
}[/code]


The trick explained : we added a class called "enlarge" (<strong>class="enlarge"</strong>) to the framed box by the shortcode option settings. We added manually a class called "hideme" to the image (class="<strong>hideme </strong>alignnone size-full wp-image-1795" ). The latter could have been avoided by directly calling the .wp-image-1795 ID. Then we addressed the classes by css and let them behave differently only below a certain viewpoint by putting that code into a viewpoint wrapper.

[code]@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
.hideme{display:none;}
.enlarge {width:100% !important;}
}[/code]

[/toggle] 



]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Table Styles</h2>

[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]

[styled_table]
<table>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th scope="col"><strong>Company</strong></th>
			<th scope="col">Header 1</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 2</th>

		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tfoot>
		<tr>
			<td colspan="5"><em>The foot text for this table</em></td>
		</tr>
	</tfoot>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 1</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 2</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 3</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 4</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
</table>
[/styled_table]

[code]
[styled_table]
<table>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th scope="col"><strong>Company</strong></th>
			<th scope="col">Header 1</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 2</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 3</th>
			<th scope="col">Header 4</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tfoot>
		<tr>
			<td colspan="5"><em>The foot text for this table</em></td>
		</tr>
	</tfoot>
	<tr>
		<td>Company 1</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
		<td>Division</td>
	</tr>
</table>
[/styled_table]
[/code]

[divider_top]

]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>7 Different Homepage Sliders</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/7-different-homepage-sliders/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 15:34:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Do you know Striking has 7 different sliders?</h2>
Striking has 7 different sliders which can be set to display in the featured header area of a page. Some of the sliders have been shortcoded so you can also call them anywhere in the page body content. The Striking theme has following sliders embedded :

[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
	<li>Nivo Slider</li>
	<li>Ken Burner Slider</li>
	<li>Accordion Slider</li>
	<li>The Roundabout Slider</li>
	<li>The Revolution Slider</li>
	<li>The Fotorama Slider</li>
	<li>The Carousel Slider</li>
</ul>
[/list]

The slider set within the page will display slides (images) of a chozen category, or images attached to a blogpost. Each slider item has settings in which the behaviour of the image while in the slideshow can be influenced.

<img title="Striking slider item options" alt="Options can be set for each slider item" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/slideshow_metabox.png" width="630" height="392" />

[divider]
<h2>Special settings for the Ken Burner slider</h2>
Each slider item has specific settings for the Ken Burner slider which can be set to make the slider item (the image) behave different for that slider only.

<img title="Striking Slider Item Ken Burner Options" alt="Slider item options for the Ken Burner Slider" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2013/11/kenburner_metabox.png" width="630" height="729" />

[divider]
<h2>Do you know Striking has unlimited Slider Presets?</h2>
In Striking you can create slider presets. in the Striking slider options you can set and applied for the behaviour of your slideshow in the frontside of the website. But unlike other themes in Striking you have the ability to create presets of those settings. This is rather neat as it allows you to have different global settings for same slideshows. This way you can have a slideshow on one page acting completely different on a another page whereas it is still the same slideshow.

<img title="Striking Slider options Presets" alt="Striking allows to save your slider options in a preset" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/SlideShow.png" width="630" height="729" />]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Accordion slider</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/7-different-homepage-sliders/accordion-slider/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 15:35:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking MultiFlex Accordion Slider Abilities</h2>
[list icon="check-square" color="red"]<ul>
<li>Supports Images, Blog Posts, Portfolio Posts and Self Gallery</li>
<li>Optionally display Captions and/or Descriptions</li>
<li>Supports First Slide Open option</li>
<li>4 different Caption Styles to choose from</li>
<li>Supports custom colors for each of the caption background, caption title and description</li>
<li>2 Caption transitions - Fade and Pop-Up</li>
<li>Can be used with the <b>Easy Slideshow Creator</b> tool for quick slider setup.</li>
<li>Supports URL linking for Images</li>
<li>Feature Header Slider only.  Maximum dimensions are 960 x 800</li>
</ul>[/list] 
**The above example of the Accordion is displaying a blog post category.

The Accordion slider is an image and post slider and is commonly used as a homepage slider or as post slider for top level navigation pages, but as it is very flexible for the content it displays, you are only limited by your imagination!

<h3 style="text-align:center;">Caption Styles</h3>
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3086" caption="Theme Default Style Option" alt="Striking MultiFlex Accordion Slider Caption Default Style Image" align="center" effect="zoom" icon="zoom" width="450" height="" autoHeight="true" quality="75"] 
[clearboth]
<h2>Settings For Accordion Slider</h2>
As this slider is available only for the Feature Header Area, it is controlled by settings located in the Accordion slider tab of the MultiFlex Slideshow Panel.  Want to use it with different options on different webpages?  No problem, just use the <strong>Create Custom Slider Configuration Presets</strong> setting (Slideshow Settings/Slideshow General Tab) to create new instances of the Accordion slider with unique settings for each display purpose.

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/unleash.png" alt="Global options Accordion Slider" width="873" height="2110" class="size-full wp-image-1729" />]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:post_id>153</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2010-09-30 15:35:40]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2010-09-30 15:35:40]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[accordion-slider]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>

	<item>
		<title>Admin Panel Options</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/admin-panel-options/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 16:44:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Admin Panel Options</h2>

All Striking settings and options are available in the wordpress backend in the Striking Section. The striking options menu has two visible states as shown in the image below.

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-admin-panel.jpg" alt="striking-admin-panel" width="477" height="382" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2689" />
[divider_top]
[notice]Clicking on one of the striking menu items will open a option panel in which settings can be changed. Depending on the option panel that is opened more tabbed panels with more options become available. In Striking one can adjust almost everything. It is this that makes Striking the most adjustable wordpress Theme sold on Themeforest.[/notice]

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-general-settings.jpg" alt="striking-general-settings" width="872" height="1283" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2690" />
[divider_top]

<h3>Striking Allows global settings to be adjusted on a single page / post basis.</h3>

[notice]The Striking Theme Options / Settings are Global. But we also provide settings to override those on a page / post or portfolio item basis. This way you can tweak your website pages individually and make pages or post look different from the default chozen style. We even allow you to tweak CSS and load JavaScript on page basis. Which theme you have ever bought besides Striking allows you this?[/notice]
[divider_padding]
[tabs]
[tab title="General" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"][divider_padding]
[notice]Override the default layout (fullwidth, sidebar left or right), Which Sidebar to Show, breadcrumbs and Sticky Footer[/notice]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/page-options-override-general.jpg" alt="page-options-override-general" width="704" height="531" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2697" />
[/tab]
[tab title="FeatHdr" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"][divider_padding]
[notice]Override the default Header settings and content of the header on a page basis (Titles, sliders and / or custom text).[/notice]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/page-options-override-featured-header.jpg" alt="page-options-override-featured-header" width="696" height="1451" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2698" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Custom Colors/ CSS /JS" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"][divider_padding]
[notice]Override default global colors, add custom css and add custom javascript to this page only.[/notice]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/page-options-override.jpg" alt="page-options-override" width="704" height="2367" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2693" />
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_top]]]></content:encoded>

		<title>SlideShow Options</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/admin-panel-options/slide-show-options/</link>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Slideshow Settings</h2>
[divider_line]

	<item>
		<title>Featured Header Area</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/featured-header-area/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 21:37:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Featured Header</h2>

The striking featured header is a very powerfull area to draw attention to anything. It allows any valid html code, shortcode, supports sliders, and has individual (color) settings per page. The featured header can have a different look on every page, post, portfolio item.

[tabs]
[tab title="Types" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"][divider_padding]
[notice]Every page has a featured header area which supports 7 types :[/notice] 
[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Default. <br />The global default on/off featured header setting in the theme general settings is picked up and the Title of the post, page, portfoplio item is displayed in the featured header area. Note: Additional information can be added depending on the meta information settings in the theme blog settings [divider_padding]</li>
<li>Title.<br />The post, page or portfolio title is displayed. If a custom title is set that will be displayed instead.[divider_padding]</li>
<li>Custom Text Only.<br />The content of the Featured Header custom text area is displayed. Any valid html or shortcode is allowed.[divider_padding]</li>
<li>Title & Custom Text.<br/> The post, page or portfolio title & the content of the Featured Header custom text area is displayed. If a custom title is set that will be displayed instead. Any valid html or shortcode is allowed in the custom text area.[divider_padding]</li>
<li>Slideshow. <br />The selected slider is presented in the featured header displaying the chozen posttypes or images. Some sliders can be fullwidth.[divider_padding]</li>
<li>Title & Slideshow. The post, page or portfolio title & the selected slider is presented in the featured header displaying the chozen posttypes or images. Some sliders can be fullwidth. If a custom title is set that will be displayed instead.[divider_padding]</li>
<li>Custom Text & Slideshow. <br />The content of the Featured Header custom text area & the selected slider are presented in the featured header displaying the chozen posttypes or images. Some sliders can be fullwidth. Any valid html or shortcode is allowed in the custom text area. [divider_padding]</li>
<li>Disable.<br/> If the global theme general settings the featured header setting is ON turned then this setting is the way to turn it OFF for the page, post or portfolio item.</li>
</ul>[/list] 
[/tab]
[tab title="Settings" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-header-introduce-text.png" alt="striking-header-introduce-text" width="920" height="1297" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2467" />
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_top]


]]></content:encoded>

[one_half]
[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]<span style="color:black;">You can add anything you prefer in this area as long as it is valid html or shortcode.</span>

		<title>3 Layouts / 6 Templates</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/layouts/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Sep 2010 21:45:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking layouts / templates</h2>

<h3>The Striking Theme comes with 3 layouts for pages and posts.</h3>

[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Fullwidth Layout</li>
<li>Left Sidebar Layout</li>
<li>Right Sidebar Layout</li>
</ul>[/list] 

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/page-layout.png" alt="page-layout" width="595" height="341" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2432" />

<h3>The Striking Theme comes with 6 templates to be set for pages.</h3>

[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Fullwidth Layout Template</li>
<li>Left Sidebar Layout Template</li>
<li>Right Sidebar Layout Template</li>
<li>Page with Comment Template</li>
<li>Landingpage Template</li>
<li>Sitemap Template</li>
</ul>[/list] 

The Striking Theme will also support with any issues your own created templates if you follow the php/css/html coding rules of the theme and wordpress.

<h3>The (custom) posttype can be set to 3 layouts</h3>

[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Fullwidth Layout</li>
<li>Left Sidebar Layout</li>
<li>Right Sidebar Layout</li>
</ul>[/list]

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/post-layout.png" alt="post-layout" width="673" height="557" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2434" />


<h3>Global default layouts</h3>

In each page, post or portfolio item a layout can be set to type "Default" in which case, for that page, post or portfolio item,  the default global layout will be picked up as set in the Striking Theme settings. Striking supports global layout settings for:

[tabs]
[tab title="Pages" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2436" caption="Global Page Layout Settings" alt="Global Page Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"] 
[/tab]
[tab title="Single Posts" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2437" caption="Global Single Post Layout Settings" alt="Global SinglePost Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"]
[/tab]
[tab title="Single Portfolio" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2438" caption="Global Single Portfolio Item Layout Settings" alt="Global Single Portfolio Item Layout Settings" align="none" icon="zoom" width="600" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" group="globallayouts" title="Global Page Layout Settings"]
[/tab]
[/tabs]
]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Fonts Replacement</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/font-replacement/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Oct 2010 00:12:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Font Replacement</h2>
The Striking theme supports many font types divided into 4 categories:


[tabs]
[tab title="Websafe" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<strong>Default Websafe fonts (located on your computer)</strong>
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/striking-default-font-settings.png" alt="striking-default-font-settings" width="879" height="665" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2455" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Cufon" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
Cufon Fonts (loaded from within a theme folder)</strong>
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/striking-cufon-font-settings.png" alt="striking-cufon-font-settings" width="882" height="697" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2456" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Fontface" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<strong>@Font-face Fonts (loaded from within a theme folder)</strong>
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/striking-fontface-fontsetting.png" alt="striking-fontface-fontsetting" width="873" height="698" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2457" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Google" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<strong>Google Fonts (loaded from a Google server)</strong>
<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/striking-google-fontsettings.png" alt="striking-google-fontsettings" width="878" height="777" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2458" />
[/tab]
[/tabs]

<h3>Fonts Unlimited</h3>
You can add as many Cufon fonts or @Font-face fonts as you like by the use of a Cufon or @Font-Face fontgenerator which you can find on the internet. This way you can add your own fonttypes to the theme. Generated fonts need to be uploaded by FTP into the correct Striking theme subfolder. Striking will detect them automatically if uploaded properly.
<h3>Custom CSS per Font or Site wide Enabled</h3>
Each of the fonts can be enabled site wide or by the use of custom css in which the font will be set for only one or more selectors / elements within the website (Note : Elements can be targeted and set on a page id basis by CSS).

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/font-specific-settings.png" alt="font-specific-settings" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Shortcode Generator</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/shortcode-generator/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Oct 2010 00:17:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The Striking Shortcodes</h2>
Any page, portfolio item, excerpt, custom featured header text area, post etc. can contain any of the striking shortcodes. In striking almost every featured is shortcoded. This makes striking one of the most powerfull themes if not the most powerfull theme you can buy at Themeforest. You get real value for money because of alone this feature and we are not even talking about all the other features striking has.

[notice]<h4 style="margin-top:20px;">Shortcodes are One of the Powerfull Abilities of the Striking Theme</h4>
<p>Shortcodes allow you to create fancy looking stuff in any page without any knowledge of css or html. We created all those for you so you can take the credits building beautifull websites.</p>[/notice]

<h3>Striking shortcodes are inserted by the Striking shortcode generator</h3>
You can access the striking shortcode generator by the Striking shortcode Generator button above the default content editor. Any valid shortcode can be pasted into any text box, textwidget anywhere in wordpress. The shortcode button can be found here: 


[tabs]
[tab title="Content Editor Visual Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In visual mode of the editor.</h4><img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode.png" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-visualmode" width="620" height="165" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2274" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Content Editor Text Mode" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h4 class="none" style="text-align:center;color:#3cabce;">In text mode of the editor.</h4>
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2270" alt="striking-shortcode-generator-textmode" src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/09/striking-shortcode-generator-textmode.png" width="620" height="138" /></li>
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]
<h2>Available shortcodes in Striking</h2>

No theme at ThemeForest has this many shortcodes !! <strong>The Striking Theme is the number one Theme in shortcoding almost all of its own abilities !!</strong>

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/all-shortcodes.jpg" alt="all-shortcodes" width="710" height="1655" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2647" />
[divider_padding]

<h2>The Shortcodes Generator</h2>

Clicking on a shortcode from the shortcode menu opens the shortcode generator for the selected shortcode. A dialog with options is presented which can be set/changed and content can be added in the available text fields. After all options have been entered/changed and set the only thing left todo is to press the insert button. Now the complete shortcode is entered into the page body content area. Once the page is viewed in the front of the website the shortcode is processed and presents the outcome following the options  as set in the shortcode generator.

[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3230" caption="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Framed Box Shortcode Options Panel"]

<h3>How does a inserted shortcode look like?</h3>

Once you press the insert button in the shortcode generator the shortcode is inserted into the page content editor. The code might look like this (if you are inserting a framed box).

[code]
[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Cras rutrum nisi nec diam imperdiet mattis. Donec faucibus ipsum nec nisl vulputate blandit? Nulla sapien eros, interdum quis commodo id, viverra quis arcu. Cras fringilla justo eget posuere auctor? Nunc ac tincidunt risus. Aliquam ut eros metus! Quisque cursus eleifend feugiat? Nulla eget lacus fermentum, faucibus magna ac, ultricies ante! Suspendisse potenti. Nunc laoreet consequat fermentum. Nulla a nisl molestie, pretium enim vitae, dignissim metus. Cras et accumsan lacus, eget sodales metus![divider_padding] [carousel width="160" height="130" source="{p}" nav="true" title="Carousel Portfolio with 3 Columns"] [/carousel][/framed_box] 
[/code]

<h3>The result of processing that shortcode is this:</h3>

[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Cras rutrum nisi nec diam imperdiet mattis. Donec faucibus ipsum nec nisl vulputate blandit? Nulla sapien eros, interdum quis commodo id, viverra quis arcu. Cras fringilla justo eget posuere auctor? Nunc ac tincidunt risus. Aliquam ut eros metus! Quisque cursus eleifend feugiat? Nulla eget lacus fermentum, faucibus magna ac, ultricies ante! Suspendisse potenti. Nunc laoreet consequat fermentum. Nulla a nisl molestie, pretium enim vitae, dignissim metus. Cras et accumsan lacus, eget sodales metus! [divider_padding] [carousel width="160" height="130" source="{p}" nav="true" title="Carousel Portfolio with 3 Columns"] [/carousel][/framed_box] 

[divider]

		<title>Custom Post Type</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/custom-post-type/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Oct 2010 00:37:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/striking/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Theme Custom Post Types</h2>

The Striking Theme has two custom posttypes:

[one_half][list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>The Portfolio Custom Posttype[divider_padding][image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2675" caption="" alt="Manage Portfolio Items in the admin backend." align="left" icon="zoom" width="160" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Manage Portfolio Items in the wordpress admin backend."] [divider_padding]</li>
</ul>[/list] [/one_half]
[one_half_last][list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>The Slider Custom Posttype[divider_padding][image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2676" caption="" alt="Manage Slider Items in the admin backend." align="left" icon="zoom" width="160" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Manage Slider Items in the Wordpress admin backend."] [divider_padding]</li>
</ul>[/list] [/one_half_last]


[one_fourth] [/one_fourth]
[one_half]Both the Custom Posts types support : 
[list icon="check" color="blue"]<ul>
<li>Add Items</li>
<li>Edit Items</li>
<li>Delete Items</li>
<li>Create / Delete / Modify  Categories</li>
<li>Backend Category Filtering</li>
<li>Grouping items by Categories</li>
<li>WPML Multi Language</li>
<li>Wordpress Roles</li>
</ul>[/list] [/one_half]
[one_fourth_last] [/one_fourth_last]


[divider_top]

[tabs]
[tab title="Portfolio Items" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>The Portfolio Custom Post Type</h3>

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2010/10/portfolio-item-list.jpg" alt="Manage Portfolio Items" width="991" height="1282" class="size-full wp-image-2677" />
[/tab]
[tab title="Slider Items" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>The Slider Custom Post Type</h3>

[/tab]
[/tabs]
