		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Page with the Sitemap Template</h2>

[content_box icon="comments-o" icon_color="#1036e6" title="Content Box" titleBgColor="rgba(204,202,202,1)"]A page with a sitemap can have any normal content. But it will display a complete sitemap below the content added in that page. The layout (page with left sidebar, page with right sidebar or fullwidth) is picked up from the global theme settings
[/content_box]

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Page with the Featured Header Custom Text and Slider</h2>

<img src="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/files/2013/12/featured-header-slider-custom-text.png" alt="featured-header-slider-custom-text" width="635" height="1040" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2621" />

[framed_box bgColor="#d7e7f5" borderColor="#ff0000" borderThickness="2" textColor="#393838"]Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Cras rutrum nisi nec diam imperdiet mattis. Donec faucibus ipsum nec nisl vulputate blandit? Nulla sapien eros, interdum quis commodo id, viverra quis arcu. Cras fringilla justo eget posuere auctor? Nunc ac tincidunt risus. Aliquam ut eros metus! Quisque cursus eleifend feugiat? Nulla eget lacus fermentum, faucibus magna ac, ultricies ante! Suspendisse potenti. Nunc laoreet consequat fermentum. Nulla a nisl molestie, pretium enim vitae, dignissim metus. Cras et accumsan lacus, eget sodales metus![/framed_box]

	<item>
		<title>Portfolio Posts</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/portfolio-posts/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Dec 2013 11:07:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2956</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Portfolio Posts</h1>
[tabs]
[tab title="Parameters" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Parameters</h3>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>column</strong> (number of columns 1-8 to display)</li>
<li><strong>height</strong> (height of featured image) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>effect</strong> : icon, zoom, blurr, grayscale, rotate, morph, tilt, none (optional)</li>
<li><strong>layout</strong> : fullwidth, sidebar (optional)/li>
<li><strong>nopaging</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>sortable_all</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ajax</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>cat</strong> : category to list</li>
<li><strong>current</strong> current category (optional)</li>
<li><strong>ids</strong> select items on id basis comma seperated (optional)</li>
<li><strong>orderby</strong> : no, page, author, post-id, title, date, random, parent-id, nr of comments, modified date (optional)</li>
<li><strong>order</strong> : DESC, ASC (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkable</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>titleLinkTarget</strong> : _blank, parent, new window, full body (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>desc_length</strong> : length of description (optional)</li>
<li><strong>advanceDesc</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>more</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreText</strong> : Read More Text (optional)</li>
<li><strong>moreButton</strong> : true,false (optional)</li>
</ul>[/list]
[/tab]
[tab title="Shortcode Option Panel" icon="check" icon_color="#3cabce"]
<h3>Shortcode Option Panel</h3>
[divider_line]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3235" caption="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" alt="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Portfolio Shortcode Options Panel"] 
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]
<h2>Sample</h2>

[portfolio column="3" layout="sidebar" sortable="true" ajax="true" cat="animals,nature,people" current="nature" more="false" moreButton="false"] 

[divider_top]

[code]
[portfolio column="3" layout="sidebar" sortable="true" ajax="true" cat="animals,nature,people" current="nature" more="false" moreButton="false"] 
[/code]

[divider_top]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Admin Panel Help Text</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/features/admin-panel-options/admin-panel-help-text/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Dec 2013 12:41:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=2989</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Striking Help Information</h2>

One of the mainstays of Striking has extremely always been its detailed inline help -> in MultiFlex we took the inline help to a whole new level with the equivalent of about 100 pgs of help text built right into the admin settings so you don't need to go hunting separately in documentation in order to understand the purpose of a setting.  And experience has taught us that the hover option with a quick text snippet that is typically found in themes usually contains not enough info, and of course disappears when you go to use the setting, not very helpful when you need step-by-step guidance.  

So MultiFlex always has help fields that are open and closed by a toggle.  So they remain open when you need to refer to them, and the click of a mouse moves them out of the way when you are done. 

Help information is also "layered" - there is help information to explain how to use main theme functions (the Striking MultiFlex Panels), how to use settings that are grouped together in an admin tab in panels or metaboxes, and help dialogs for individuals settings.  Every step of the way we have you covered.  Don't know what the heck a portfolio is?  Its covered.  Don't know the diff between a thumbnail and a featured image?  Its covered! Don't know what a blog list is?  Its Covered!! :)

These images indicate where you can find some help, and also give you a basic understanding of how the admin is structured:
[divider_advanced color="rgba(219,22,22,1)" paddingTop="15" paddingBottom="20" thickness="4" width="70%"] 
<h4 style="text-align:center;">A typical MultiFlex admin panel:</h4>
[divider_padding]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2992" caption="Locations of Help Fields in a MultiFlex Panel" alt="The Striking Help Information Panel" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Some of the Help Fields and Where to Find Them" lightbox_fittoview="false"] 
[divider_padding]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Example of the help in that little "Help" tab up in the top right hand corner of the above image.....its different for each panel.</h4>
[divider_padding]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2993" caption="The Striking Help Panels" alt="The Striking Help Panels" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="The help text will be different in every panel dropdown" lightbox_fittoview="false"] 
[divider_padding]
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Individual settings help</h4>
[divider_padding][image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="2999" caption="Striking Individual Settings" alt="Striking Individual Settings" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="The help dialogs include a variety of information" lightbox_fittoview="false"] 
[divider_advanced color="rgba(219,22,22,1)" paddingTop="15" paddingBottom="25" thickness="4" width="70%"] 
<h4 style="text-align:center;">Throughout this Demo there are Example Code Snippets which you can copy and paste right into your site to help get you started.</h4>
[divider_padding]
[image source_type="attachment_id" source_value="3000" caption="The Striking Help Demo Code" alt="Striking Help Demo Code" align="center" icon="zoom" width="594" autoHeight="true" quality="100" lightbox="true" title="Opening the Toggle reveals the code snippet you can copy and paste directly into your site" lightbox_fittoview="false"] 
[divider_padding]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Masonry</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/shortcodes/masonry/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Jan 2014 13:28:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=3302</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Masonry</h1>
<h2>Parameters</h2>
[divider_line]
[list icon="check" color="blue"]
<ul>
<li><strong>column</strong> (how many columns to show): 2, 3, 4, 5</li>
<li><strong>number</strong> (number of posts to show per page)</li>
<li><strong>post_type</strong> (specific post type to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>taxonomy</strong> (specific taxonomy to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>terms</strong>  (specific category to show) (optional)</li>
<li><strong>title</strong> (whether to display title): true,false</li>
<li><strong>desc</strong> (whether to display description): true,false</li>
<li><strong>paging</strong> (whether to display pagination): true,false</li>
</ul>

[divider_padding]
<h2>Samples</h2>
[divider_line]
<h3>Blog Masonry</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="post" number="6" column="2" desc="true" desc_length="15"]
[/code]

[masonry post_type="post" number="12" column="3" desc="true" desc_length="15" taxonomy="category" terms="Infomation,Nature,News,Technology,Travel,Uncategorized"]

[divider_top]

<h3>Portfolio Masonry with Specific category</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3"] 
[/code]

[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="15" column="3"] 

[divider_top]

<h3>Portfolio Masonry without title and description</h3>
[code]
[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3" title="false" desc="false"] 
[/code]

[masonry post_type="portfolio" taxonomy="portfolio_category" terms="Animals,Nature,People" number="6" column="3" title="false" desc="false"] 

[divider_top]

]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Blog Mansory Mode</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/blog/blog-mansory-mode/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 18 Feb 2014 23:29:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=3713</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Choose the Masonry Mode to Show your Posts Without getting their Images Cropped</h2>
[divider_line]
All the images will keep their original aspect ratio. Perfect if you are using a mixture of portrait and landscape shaped featured images for your posts.
[divider_padding]
[divider_padding]
[masonry taxonomy="category" terms="Infomation,Nature,News,Technology,Travel,Uncategorized" desc="true" desc_length="20" number="12"]
[toggle title="Get the Code"][code][masonry taxonomy="category" terms="Infomation,Nature,News,Technology,Uncategorized" desc="true" desc_length="20" number="12"] [/code][/toggle] 

]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Content Choreography</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/content-choreography-responsive-freedom/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 19 Feb 2014 11:32:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=3729</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[divider_padding]
<h1 style="text-align: center">[responsive_text compression="23" fontSize="34" min="16"][icon_font type="bullhorn" color="#CC2D2D" size="large" rotate="horizontal"]<span style="color: #575757"> • JUST STRIKING MULTIFLEX OFFERS YOU •</span> [icon_font type="bullhorn" color="#CC2D2D" size="large"][/responsive_text]
[responsive_text compression="10" fontSize="87"]<span style="color: #2891cc">CONTENT CHOREOGRAPHY</span>[/responsive_text][framed_box width="80%" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="transparent" borderThickness="0" align="center"][responsive_text compression="35" min="14" lineHeight="1.65" ]In responsive sites, the blocks of content get rearranged differently depending on the screen width and resolution in order to give a better experience to the user. That is performed automatically, but sometimes it is desirable to have it done in a particular way, in one word, to have more control over the process. Striking Multiflex is the first theme to offer Content Choreography for that purpose, so you can decide how the different columns move around on the smaller devices. For the following examples try resizing the width of your browser with your mouse.[/responsive_text] [/framed_box]</h1>
[divider_advanced color="rgba(158,155,155,1)" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="45" thickness="2" width="30%"]
<h2 style="text-align: center">[responsive_text compression="36" max="27" min="16" lineHeight="1.65" fontSize="20"]SOME EXAMPLES
[icon_font type="arrow-down" color="#CC2D2D" size="large"][/responsive_text]</h2>
[divider_padding]
[divider_padding]
<h2>[responsive_text compression="25" min="26" fontSize="32" lineHeight="1.225"]Six-Column Layout - Three Possible Choreographies[/responsive_text]</h2>
[responsive_text compression="50" min="14" lineHeight="1.65" ]If your six columns are related to each other with a specific logic then they should be rearranged in a concrete way in narrower screens. A picture is worth a thousand words so let's have a look at the following examples.[/responsive_text]
[divider_padding]
<h3>[responsive_text compression="35" min="22" fontSize="26"]6 columns become 1[/responsive_text]</h3>
[divider_advanced color="rgba(158,155,155,1)" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="35" thickness="1" width="100%"]
[one_sixth][icon_font type="group" color="#cc2d2d" size="3x" pull="left"]At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum. Uterim enim ad minimaelieri veniam, quisetunae nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris. [divider_padding]
[/one_sixth]
[one_sixth] [icon_font type="coffee" color="#2795d1" size="3x" pull="left"]At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum. Uterim enim ad minimaelieri veniam, quisetunae nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris.[divider_padding]
[/one_sixth]

[/one_sixth]

[/one_sixth]

[/one_sixth_last]

[divider_advanced color="rgba(158,155,155,1)" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="60" thickness="1" width="100%"]
<h3>[responsive_text compression="35" min="22" fontSize="26"]6 columns become 2[/responsive_text]</h3>
[divider_advanced color="rgba(158,155,155,1)" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0" thickness="1" width="100%"]

<h2>[responsive_text compression="25" min="26" fontSize="32" lineHeight="1.225"]Four-Column Layout - Two Possible Choreographies[/responsive_text]</h2>
[responsive_text compression="50" min="14" lineHeight="1.65" ]If your four columns are related to each other with a specific logic then they should be rearranged in a concrete way in narrower screens. A picture is worth a thousand words so let's have a look at the following examples.[/responsive_text]
[divider_padding]
<h3>[responsive_text compression="35" min="22" fontSize="26"]4 columns become 1[/responsive_text]</h3>
[divider_advanced color="rgba(158,155,155,1)" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="35" thickness="1" width="100%"]
[one_fourth][icon_font type="hand-o-up" color="#c12f2f" size="5x" pull="left"]

<h2>
    More About the Font Awesome Implementation in Striking Multiflex
</h2>[divider_padding] [one_half] [framed_box bgColor="#D54242" textColor="#ffffff" borderColor="#DD2929" borderThickness="0" rounded="true"] [responsive_text compression="17" max="24" min="18" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"] <strong>The Most Advanced Implementation of Font Awesome</strong><br>
[/responsive_text] [button size="large" align="right" link="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/font-awesome-icons-overview/" color="" bgColor="white" textColor="#C23030" icon="th-list" icon_color="#C23030"] Let's See an Overview of the Shortcode! [/button] [divider_padding] [/framed_box] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box bgColor="#228ACE" textColor="#ffffff" borderColor="#0F74B6" borderThickness="0" rounded="true"] [responsive_text compression="17" max="24" min="18" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"] <strong>The Icons are Available in Many other Shortcodes Too!</strong><br>
[/responsive_text] [button id="font_awesome_full_set" size="large" align="right" link="http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/font-awesome-icons-in-shortcodes/" color="" bgColor="#ffffff" textColor="#0F74B6" icon="th" icon_color="#0F74B6"]Let's See Them in other Shortcodes[/button] [divider_padding] [/framed_box] [/one_half_last]
]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Font Awesome Icon Fonts Overview</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/font-awesome-icons-overview/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 12 Apr 2014 06:10:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=4790</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>The <strong>Icon Font Shortcode</strong></h1>
[responsive_text compression="50" max="22" min="14" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="16"]
The <em>Icon Font</em> shortcode contains a huge number of options, allowing you to tune up the appearance of each icon. These icons can be placed in any paragraph or heading and even within virtually any other shortcode, getting amazing results.
[/responsive_text]
[divider_padding]

[content_box title="Light style icons" width="100%" titleBgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" titleTextColor="#000" bgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center"][responsive_text compression="23" max="38" min="10" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="30"][icon_font type="heart-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]    [icon_font type="bell-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]     [icon_font type="bookmark-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]    [icon_font type="comment-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]   [icon_font type="flag-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]   [icon_font type="star-o" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"] 
[/responsive_text]
[/content_box]

[content_box title="Solid style icons" width="100%" titleBgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" titleTextColor="#000" bgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center"][responsive_text compression="23" max="38" min="10" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"][icon_font type="heart" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]    [icon_font type="bell" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]     [icon_font type="bookmark" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]    [icon_font type="comment" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]   [icon_font type="flag" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]   [icon_font type="star" color="#3B3F61" size="3x"]
[/responsive_text]
[/content_box]

[responsive_text compression="24" max="63" min="8" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"]
[icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534"]  [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="large"]  [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="2x"]   [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="3x"]   [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="4x"]    [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="5x"]    [icon_font type="html5 " color="#E26534" size="6x"]
[/responsive_text]

<h2>Hover effects</h2>
[content_box title="Combine different colors on hover for the icon, background and border" width="100%" titleBgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" titleTextColor="#000" bgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center" class=""][responsive_text compression="47" max="63" min="5" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"][icon_font type="bullhorn" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="transparent" hoverColor="#fff" hoverBgColor="#E05454" hoverBorderColor="#E05454" border="true" borderRadius="circle"][icon_font type="rocket" color="#3295D6" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="transparent" hoverBorderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle"][icon_font type="dashboard" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#E05454" borderColor="#E05454" hoverColor="#E05454" hoverBgColor="transparent" hoverBorderColor="transparent" border="true" borderRadius="circle"][icon_font type="magic" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#3295D6" borderColor="#3295D6" hoverColor="#3295D6" hoverBgColor="transparent" hoverBorderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle"][icon_font type="gift" color="#DD5F5F" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#DD5F5F" hoverColor="#3295D6" hoverBgColor="transparent" hoverBorderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle"][/responsive_text]

<h2>Set your desired padding for your border and/or background</h2>
[tabs]
[tab title="Circular" anchor="circular_border" icon="circle-o" icon_color="#e22222"]
[responsive_text compression="45" max="63" min="6" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"]
[icon_font type="github-alt" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle" padding="0.0001"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle" padding="0.1"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle" padding="0.2"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle" padding="0.3"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#E05454" size="4x" bgColor="transparent" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="circle" padding="0.4"][/responsive_text]
[/tab]
[tab title="Rounded Square" anchor="rounded_square_border" icon="square-o" icon_color="#e22222"]
[responsive_text compression="45" max="63" min="6" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#E05454" borderColor="#E05454" border="true" borderRadius="rounded" padding="0.0001"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#3295D6" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="rounded" padding="0.1"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#E05454" borderColor="#E05454" border="true" borderRadius="rounded" padding="0.2"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#3295D6" borderColor="#3295D6" border="true" borderRadius="rounded" padding="0.3"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="#fff" size="4x" bgColor="#E05454" borderColor="#E05454" border="true" borderRadius="rounded" padding="0.4"][/responsive_text]
[/tab]
[tab title="<span></span>Square" anchor="square_border"]
[responsive_text compression="45" max="63" min="6" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="38"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" size="4x" bgColor="#DD5F5F" borderColor="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" border="true" borderRadius="square" padding="0.0001"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" size="4x" bgColor="#5CB0E7" borderColor="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" border="true" borderRadius="square" padding="0.1"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" size="4x" bgColor="#DD5F5F" borderColor="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" border="true" borderRadius="square" padding="0.2"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" size="4x" bgColor="#5CB0E7" borderColor="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" border="true" borderRadius="square" padding="0.3"][icon_font type="github-alt" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" size="4x" bgColor="#DD5F5F" borderColor="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)" border="true" borderRadius="square" padding="0.4"][/responsive_text]
[/tab]
[/tabs]

[divider_padding]

[content_box title="Pull Left &amp; Right - Make Them Float!" width="100%" titleBgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" titleTextColor="#000" bgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[three_fifth] 
<h1>Font Awesome Icon Font</h1>

<h2><strong>479 Icons </strong>Fully Implemented Into the Theme</h2>

<p>[icon_font type="star" color="#D85A5A" size="large"] [icon_font type="star" color="#DD9D3A" size="large"] [icon_font type="star" color="#A6DD55" size="large"] [icon_font type="star" color="#52CDD8" size="large"] [icon_font type="star" color="#DA87E1" size="large"] </p>
<div style="text-align: left;">
<p>Striking Multiflex offers you the most advanced implementation of Font Awesome available in a premium theme, with its own shortcode, and integrated into other shortcodes and menu items. This vector icon set has the many unique features:</p>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Small file size</strong> compared to PNG icons</li>
	<li><strong>They remain crisp</strong> when zooming in and on <strong>Retina</strong> screens</li>
	<li><strong>Quickly and easily change their size and color</strong> (including opacity)</li>
	<li><strong>Add borders and background + Rotate/ flip/ spin</strong> them</li>
	<li>Apply custom CSS like <strong>shadows, strokes and gradients/textures</strong></li>
</ul>
</div>
[/three_fifth]

[/testimonials]



[/two_fifth_last]]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_page_background_target]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[#page]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Font Awesome Used In Other Shortcodes</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/font-awesome-icons-in-shortcodes/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 21 Apr 2014 11:39:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?page_id=5005</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[responsive_text compression="30" max="32" min="20" lineHeight="1.6" fontSize="24"]<span class="center_text">Not only does MultiFlex feature a dedicated shortcode with all its features for Font Awesome icons, but they are available in many other shortcodes too!</span>[/responsive_text]
[divider_padding]
[content_box title="In the <strong><em>Process Steps</em></strong> shortcode " width="100%" titleBgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" titleTextColor="#000" bgColor="rgba(255,255,255,1)" rounded="true" align="center"]


[process_steps type="horizontal" size="small" number="5"]
[process_step title="Step 1" icon="heart-o" icon_color="#E05454"]
Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt.[/process_step]
[process_step title="Step 2" icon="bell-o" icon_color="#E05454"]
Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt.
[/process_step]
[process_step title="Step 3" icon="bookmark-o" icon_color="#E05454"]
Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt.
[/process_step]
[process_step title="Step 4" icon="comment-o" icon_color="#E05454"]
Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt.
[/process_step]
[process_step title="Step 5" icon="star-o" icon_color="#E05454"]
Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt.
[/process_step]
[/process_steps]

[divider_padding]

overflow: hidden;

}

    min-width: 33px !important;
}

<h2>Nam liber tempor cum soluta nobis</h2>

	<item>
		<title>Video Portfolio Post - Youtube</title>
		<link>http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/videos/video-portfolio-item-youtube/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 26 May 2014 01:47:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[kaptinlin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kaptinlin.com/themes/strikingr/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=5276</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tvideo type="youtube" clip_id="6D-A6CL3Pv8#t=174" width="960" height="480" controls="true" fs="true" rel="true" theme="light"] 
[divider_padding]
<h3>About this Video</h3>
Part I/IV of a timelapse series through the always changing landscapes of New Zealand. Shot over 4 month, travelling through amazing landscapes, sleeping under the stars, hiking on mountains and exploring remote roads. Locations in this video where at Fjordland NP, Mount Cook NP and Arthurs Pass NP, Mavora Lakes and Lake Ohau.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Beautiful 4k timelapse video on Youtube by TimeStorm Films. Soundtrack: "Science and Religion" by Hans Zimmer]]></excerpt:encoded>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_page_background_position_y]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[top]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
</channel>
</rss>
